memberdef.argsstring: (const BiasParams &params, gmx_int64_t numUpdates, double weighthistScaling, double logPmfSumScaling)
memberdef.name: performPreviouslySkippedUpdates

briefdescription.para: Apply previous updates that were skipped.

detaileddescription.para: An update can only be skipped if the parameters needed for the update are constant or deterministic so that the same update can be performed at a later time. Here, the necessary parameters are the sampled weight and scaling factors for the histograms. The scaling factors are provided as arguments only to avoid recalculating them for each point
The last update index is also updated here.

parameterdescription.para: Scale factor for the reference weight histogram.
Scale factor for the reference PMF histogram.

simplesect.para: true if at least one update was applied.

memberdef.argsstring: (const BiasParams &params, gmx_int64_t numUpdates, double weighthistScaling, double logPmfSumScaling)
memberdef.name: updateWithNewSampling

briefdescription.para: Apply a point update with new sampling.

simplesect.para: The last update index is also updated here.
The new sampling containers are cleared here.

parameterdescription.para: Scaling factor for the reference weight histogram.
Log of the scaling factor for the PMF histogram.

briefdescription.para: Update the PMF histogram with the current coordinate value.

detaileddescription.para: Note that renormalization over all points is needed after the update.

parameterdescription.para: The cut-off for the free energy for target type "cutoff".

briefdescription.para: Set the weight and count accumulated since the last update.
Add the weights and counts accumulated between updates.
Scale the target weight of the point.
Update the free energy estimate of a point.

detaileddescription.para: The free energy update here is inherently local, i.e. it just depends on local sampling and on constant AWH parameters. This assumes that the variables used here are kept constant, at least in between global updates.

parameterdescription.para: Sampled probability weight at this point.

briefdescription.para: Update the reference weight histogram of a point.

parameterdescription.para: Sampled probability weight at this point.
Factor to rescale the histogram with.

memberdef.argsstring: (const BiasParams &params, double weightAtPoint, double weighthistScaling, double logPmfSumScaling)
memberdef.name: updateFreeEnergyAndWeight

briefdescription.para: Apply a point update.

detaileddescription.para: This updates local properties that can be updated without accessing or affecting all points. This excludes updating the size of reference weight histogram and the target distribution. The bias update is excluded only because if updates have been skipped this function will be called multiple times, while the bias only needs to be updated once (last).

Since this function only performs the update with the given arguments and does not know anything about the time of the update, the last update index is not updated here. The caller should take care of updating the update index.

parameterdescription.para: Sampled probability weight at this point.
Scaling factor for the reference weight histogram.
Log of the scaling factor for the PMF histogram.

briefdescription.para: The state of a coordinate point.

internal.para: This class contains all the state variables of a coordinate point (on the bias grid) and methods to update the state of a point.
